Content: Kandy branch of the Ex-Servicemenâ€™s Association remembered war veterans at the Army memorial in the Joseph E. De Silva Park to coincide with the Remembrance Day, commemorated at the Colombo Vihara Maha Devi Park on Sunday (11). Governor of the Central Province Hon P.B Dissanayake attended as the Chief Guest on the occasion. Sri Lanka Army band and drill platoons participated in the memorial service. Retired and serving tri-service and Police personnel participated in the arrangement.
